file_content.text: When this shield generator is destroyed, the Star Fortress will be open to attack.
My men already engage the enemy. I request the honor of joining you in battle, Commander.
We'll meet inside the Star Fortress shield generator bunker. Victory will be ours.
My warriors stand ready. The time has come. We will enter the shield generator bunker. Destroy it from within.
[Turn in Smuggled Goods crate.]
You've done well. Now we must breach the shield generator. Burn out its heart.
Seek the shield generator. Learn what you can.
You honor me, Commander. We met years ago. But you wouldn't remember.
We have no quarrel. Be at peace.
My brothers attacked you. I was too young for war. They said to hide. I obeyed, and survived their mistake.
Sorry, but I don't remember killing your brothers.
Why did your brothers attack me?
You know what I can do. Don't cross me, and we'll get along fine.
You killed many in the old war. My brothers were only five of them.
You are the Death Who Walks. You will bring your ruin to our enemies.
This was during the old war. Your people allied with our enemy. The Voss.
I reveal our shared past out of respect, Commander. There is no quarrel between us. My brothers fought well. You fought better.
You're saying no Gormak infants are healthy since the Star Fortress appeared over Voss?
That's what I'm here to do. Where do we start?
Don't be superstitious. It's a space station, not a curse.
Our king believes it poisons us from above. The young, the old, and the weak suffer.
I tell you what I know. My people are dying.
The Star Fortress has powerful defenses. Its shield generator must fall--and even that is guarded.
You are the Commander. You will find its weakness. I mark the shield generator's location. Go there. See what must be done.
I will gather soldiers. You must gather supplies. When all is ready, we strike as one.
Where can I find supplies?
I don't have time for this. Tell your soldiers to find their own supplies.
Only power defeats power. Emperor Arcann took ours. You can restore it.
This world has many in need of your strength. Lend it to them. Take what we need in return. Bring supplies here.
When we have enough, the war can begin.
[Start the Voss Resistance Campaign. Completion will grant a massive Influence gain.]
[Start a Heroic Mission to secure supply crates.]
[Start an Eternal Empire Champion Duel.]
[Report the Voss Resistance Campaign is complete to receive a massive Influence gain.]
We do not strike until prepared. My soldiers need supplies.
Good! These will serve us well.
A great victory for our cause! You bring us to the brink of victory, Commander.
The old war still rages. It distracts this world from facing the true enemy. To destroy the Star Fortress, you should end this conflict.
There is a great need for your strength, Commander. Answer the call. You will be rewarded.
Emperor Arcann's hunter pursues us. Strike it first, and we'll remain strong.
I watched my brothers die by your hand. I learned from you. And now, I am ready to serve you.
No child of my people has been born healthy since the Star Fortress appeared in our sky. It brought a plague to my world. We must destroy it.
It's a privilege to be your ally. Together, we'll fight the Eternal Empire. Break its curse on my world.
Return with more supplies, so we may destroy the Star Fortress.
But we're not yet ready to invade the Star Fortress shield generator.
I'll find more supplies.
Good hunting, Commander.
Let's move. I'll see you inside.
You'll be joining me?
Just stay out of my way.
I live to serve your Alliance. If my death brings victory, so be it.
I've prepared for this my whole life. I will not fail you.
When today ends, the enemy's shield will lie in flames.
Follow me. We'll destroy this place together.
When this shield generator falls, the Star Fortress will finally be vulnerable to attack.
You did it, Commander! The cursed Star Fortress above my world is finally dust. The poison from the sky no longer afflicts my people.
Fate is strange. If my brothers had killed you, my world would still be cursed. It is... right... that things turned out this way.
You must press the attack before the enemy rebuilds the shield generator.
The Star Fortress must fall. Only you have the strength to do that, Commander.
Now I am free to fight at your side. Your foes are mine, now and forever.
A great victory! Without its shield, the Star Fortress is yours for the taking!
My orders are to coordinate the assault from Odessen. We'll meet again there, Commander.
And when that cursed fortress dies, I will serve at your side. For my people. For the Alliance.
Free my world, and I will serve at your side for the rest of my days. Good hunting!
[Start the Voss Resistance Campaign. Completion will grant a massive Influence gain.]
[Do Nothing.]
Now I am free to fight at your side. Your foes are mine, now and forever.
[Turn in Alien Research crate.]
[Turn in Ancient Artifact crate.]
[Turn in Military Equipment crate.]
[Turn in supply crates.]
[Go Back.]
Honor to you, Commander.
My new brothers share stories and knowledge of places unknown. I wish to see these wonders one day with my own eyes.
The Eternal Empire is a poison to all. We must be the cure.
We face our foes as one. United, we shall succeed.
The Death Who Walks returns. Our enemies have time to rest, for now.
So many new technologies. Their marvels are endless.
The galaxy is full of colors that I did not know existed. My people deserve to see the beauty beyond the stars.
We will silence the Eternal Empire and bring light to those in shadow.
